emojifier.title: Image emojifier
emojifier.description: Convert a normal image in a mosaic of emojis based on the average color of a set square of pixel, then matches this color with the calculated average color of an emoji.

renoving.title: Renoving Habitat
renoving.description: Renoving Habitat is a website made for a young company specializing in house construction and renovation, the main feature is a fully customizable and component based form for online cost estimate.

cryptoCharts.title: Crypto Charts
cryptoCharts.description: Crypto charts allows you to have a quick overview of the current state of the cryptocurrency market. You can compare the biggest winners and loosers at different timeframes and create custom sets of cryptos you want to keep and eye on.

perlinNoise.title: Perlin noise map
perlinNoise.description: Create a random islands on a 2d based on multiple sets of perlin noises, you can even draw islands yourself ! (very wip)

DMAG.title: Draw Me A Garden
DMAG.description: Draw Me A Garden is a startup that specializes in building tailored gardens for its customers. I was able to work with the team during an internship on several website features such as customer advices, administration systems, project research, ui.
